video.title: Zero Hour
video.synopsis: Through dramatic retellings, this documentary series focuses on the final hour leading up to some of the biggest moments in modern history.

episodes.synopsis: On a fateful spring morning in 1986, the world changed forever when the largest nuclear reactor of its kind exploded at the Chernobyl Power Station.
episodes.title: Disaster at Chernobyl

episodes.synopsis: The final hour of American Airlines Flight 11 changes the world forever on Sept. 11, 2001, when the plane flies directly into the World Trade Center.
episodes.title: The Last Hour of Flight 11

episodes.synopsis: On an April morning in Colorado, high school students Eric Harris and Dylan Klebold launch a mass massacre before turning their guns on themselves.
episodes.title: Massacre at Columbine High

episodes.synopsis: A carefully coordinated plan of mass, indiscriminate killing unfolds in an hour as five men set out to poison the Tokyo Metro system.
episodes.title: Terror In Tokyo

episodes.synopsis: Expert interviews and a dramatic reconstruction shed light on the hour leading up to the most devastating terrorist attack in Asian history.
episodes.title: The Bali Bombing

episodes.synopsis: A dangerous subculture of guns, racism and perverted patriotism drove Timothy McVeigh to commit the worst act of domestic terrorism in U.S. history.
episodes.title: One Of America's Own

episodes.synopsis: Interviews with passengers and crew help piece together the final hour of the Estonia's voyage and explain how some were able to survive the tragedy.
episodes.title: The Sinking of Estonia

episodes.synopsis: Eyewitness testimonies and telephone transcripts offer context to an intense, second by second reconstruction of drug lord Pablo Escobar’s final hour.
episodes.title: The King of Cocaine

episodes.synopsis: This reconstruction highlights the last hour of the American-led military raid which resulted in the capture of reviled Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein.
episodes.title: Capturing Saddam

episodes.synopsis: Since the 1981 shooting of Pope John Paul II, theories have persisted that the Bulgarians and the KGB were behind the assassination attempt.
episodes.title: The Plot To Kill The Pope

episodes.synopsis: February 28, 1997: An armed bank robbery turns into a violent shootout involving more than 300 police officers in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: North Hollywood Shootout

episodes.synopsis: June 1, 2001: The shocking and brutal massacre of ten members of the Nepalese royal family at the hands of one of their own, Crown Prince Dipendra.
episodes.title: A Royal Massacre

episodes.synopsis: September 10, 2000: Six British soldiers captured by a rebel group in Sierra Leone are the subjects of an audacious SAS rescue mission.
episodes.title: SAS Mission Impossible

episodes.synopsis: April 22, 1997: The last hour of the last day of a terrifying siege lasting 126 days in the Japanese Embassy in Lima, Peru, with high-level hostages.
episodes.title: The Lima Siege

episodes.synopsis: February 1, 2003: The final hour of the Space Shuttle Columbia before it disintegrated over Texas, resulting in the loss of seven brave astronauts.
episodes.title: Fallling Star: Columbia

episodes.synopsis: December 26, 1994: The conclusion of a two-day stand-off between Algerian hijackers on Air France Flight 8969 and France's counterterrorism unit.
episodes.title: Shootout in Marseilles
